code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../CSS Files/ShowProductDetails.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowProductDetails=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[product,setProduct]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const productData=localStorage.getItem('searchedProducts');if(productData){setProduct(JSON.parse(productData));}},[]);const handleProceedToPayment=()=>{navigate("../paymentprocess",{state:{product}});};if(!product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-showproductdetails",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"mb-4 heading-showproductdetails",children:"Product Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.imageUrl,alt:product.model?product.model.modelName:'Product Image',className:"product-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Model Name :"})," ",product.model?product.model.modelName:'Unknown Model']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Description :"}),product.model?product.model.description:'No description available']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Base Price :"})," ",product.model?product.model.basePrice:'N/A']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Discounted Price :"})," ",product.discounted_price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Price to pay :"})," ",product.model.basePrice-product.discounted_price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-outline-primary btn-showproductdetails",onClick:handleProceedToPayment,children:"Proceed to Payment"})]})]});};export default ShowProductDetails;
